articles.title: Sowing Rice Seeds in Cold-Beds Finished
articles.content:
Sowing Rice Seeds in Cold-Beds Finished
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Sowing rice seeds in cold-beds was finished on all farms across the country.
					 Cities and counties in South Hwanghae Province proved successful in seed treatment, sprouting and laying out rice-seedling beds, etc. They wound up sowing seeds in areas under plan as of May 7.
					
					 Anju City, Sukchon County, Taedong County and other cities and counties in South Phyongan Province made good arrangements for growing healthy rice seedlings for transplantation. The sowing of rice seeds in cold-beds was also rounded off on farms in North Phyongan Province.
					
					 Cities and counties in North Hwanghae Province including Sariwon City, Hwangju County and Koksan County and farms in the east coastal areas and the northern areas including Kangwon Province and North and South Hamgyong Provinces also finished sowing rice seeds in the right time.

articles.title: Swiss Women's Delegation Here
articles.content:
Swiss Women's Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- A Swiss women's delegation headed by Haag Carmen, chairperson of the Christian Democratic People's Party group of the Thurgau canton parliament, arrived here today.

articles.title: More Animals Settled in Central Zoo
articles.content:
More Animals Settled in Central Zoo
						
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Twenty-two animals of six species have been added to the Central Zoo of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 They were sent to General Secretary Kim Jong Il by the Kuwaiti Zoo on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Among them are a pair of African lions (Panthera leo), a pair of dromedaries (Camelus dromedarius), a pair of barbary sheep (Ammotragus lervia), a pair of black bucks (Antilope cervicapra), four pairs of hamadryas baboons (Papio hamadryas) and vervet monkeys (Cercopithecus aethiopus), four male and two female.
					
					 The dromedaries, with legs some 30 centimeters longer than other camels living in the Central Zoo, are 1.6-1.7 meters high in the shoulder part, about 2.5 meters long and 400-500 kilograms heavy.
					
					 The new comers have been placed under a scientific and technological care at the Central Zoo.

articles.title: Worldwide Demands for Kaesong Koryo Insam Grow
articles.content:
Worldwide Demands for Kaesong Koryo Insam Grow
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Insam (ginseng) of Korea has been well known in the world as elixir of life from ancient times.
					 Insam, finding its way to other countries in the period of Koryo (918-1392) to win a greater popularity for its efficacy, began to be called Koryo insam or Kaesong Koryo insam.
					
					 Kaesong, which was the capital of Koryo, was also a hub of insam trade because it had climatic, soil and other natural and geographical conditions favorable for insam cultivation and processing.
					
					 Insam plots find themselves in different parts of the area.
					
					 The medicinal effect of insam is very high.
					
					 The Kaesong Insam Processing Factory, the Koryo Medicine Factory and other insam processing factories, based on advanced science and technology, manufacture many kinds of processed insam such as tonic, extract, pills, tea and injection as well as steamed-and-dried insam, dried insam, Kyongok tonic and women's tonic.
					
					 Insam liquor is also famous for its medicinal effect.
					
					 Insam is used in making quality cosmetics, too.
					
					 The demand for Kaesong Koryo Insam, one of the Korean special products, and its processed goods is steadily increasing in local and foreign markets.

articles.title: Focusing All Efforts on Rice-Transplantation Called for
articles.content:
Focusing All Efforts on Rice-Transplantation Called for
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday calls upon all the people to successfully conclude the rice-transplanting campaign in hearty response to the militant call of the Workers' Party of Korea to bring about a decisive turn in improving the people's standard of living by putting spurs to the development of light industry and agriculture once again this year marking the 65th birthday of the WPK, and thus bring a bumper harvest to the socialist cooperative fields in October without fail.
					 The above-said militant call made in the joint New Year editorial of three major newspapers this year reflects the firm will of the WPK to enable the Korean people to live a happy life as others at an early date and bring earlier the ultimate victory in the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation, the daily in an editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					The DPRK has laid all foundations for radically boosting the agricultural production under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The cultivated land of the country was realigned to befit the land of socialism, large-scale waterways including the Kaechon-Lake Thaesong waterway find their ways to every field of cooperative farms and Juche-based fertilizers are now being mass-produced to the great joy of all the people.
					
					 A signal turn is sure to take place in the agricultural production when we give fullest play to the existing strong production potential, true to the WPK policy for bringing about a radical change in agriculture.
					
					 Success can be made in the rice-transplanting campaign only when not only the officials and other working people in the field of agriculture but all other people turn out in it as it is a labor-consuming farming process which should be completed without delay, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: Nation's Will for Reunification Expressed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Nation's Will for Reunification Expressed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) held a meeting in Seoul on May 6 calling for a more vigorous movement for national reunification.
					 Noting that this year marks the 20th anniversary of the formation of Pomminryon and the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, the organization said that it is regrettable that compatriots in the north and the south and abroad can not observe these anniversaries together due to the authorities' policy of confrontation.
					
					 The organization declared that it would form the committee for promoting the work to commemorate the 20th anniversary of Pomminryon, publish a white paper on Pomminryon's activities and the struggle for national independence and great national unity and hold a seminar on the tasks and role of the reunification movement camp on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It stressed that it would call a press conference for implementing the inter-Korean declarations, building peace mechanism and legalizing Pomminryon in the future and thus demonstrate internally and externally the will of the nation for peace and reunification.

articles.title: Songun Politics Praised in Syria
articles.content:
Songun Politics Praised in Syria 
Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- A book dedicated to the centenary of birth of President
					 Kim Il Sung "Theory of Songun Politics of Kim Jong Il" was brought out by the Dar Damascus Publishing House of Syria.
					Edited on the front cover and pages of the book written by Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea in Jordan, are photos of General Secretary Kim Jong Il waving back to the cheering military paraders and inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 It consists of "Chapter 1 Background of the Time against Which Songun Politics Made Its Appearance," "Chapter 2 Songun Revolution and the Creation of Songun Political Mode," "Chapter 3 What Kind of Political Mode Songun Politics Is," "Chapter 4 Ideological and Moral Basis of Songun Politics," "Chapter 5 Great Vitality of Songun Politics" and "Chapter 6 Songun Politics Serves as an Eternal Revolutionary Strategy for Achieving Peace and Independence in Korean Peninsula and World."
					
					 The book explains that Kim Jong Il established the Songun politics as the most scientific and revolutionary fundamental political mode under socialism in the era of independence and it is politics of ardent love for the country, the nation and the people and the most powerful and dignified politics of independence. And it explains the principle of putting the army ahead of the working class, which was set forth for the first time in history, and the validity of the new viewpoint on the main force of the revolution, comparing them with the preceding theories.
					
					 The book cites facts that the cause of perpetuating the memory of Kim Il Sung was accomplished on the highest level in the DPRK and it is dynamically pushing forward the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation, meeting all sorts of challenges of the imperialists with the might of Songun.
					
					 The Songun politics serves as an eternal banner of the anti-imperialist struggle which all the countries and nations aspiring after independence against domination and subjugation should hold aloft, a perfect political mode representing not only the present but the future of mankind and a strategic line to be held fast to by them forever, stresses the author in the book.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, May 11 (KCNA) -- On December 28, Juche 45 (1956) President Kim Il Sung had a consultative meeting with officials and exemplary workers of the then Kangson Steel Plant. After the meeting he convened a conference of housewives.
					 It was so great a surprise and honor for the women to participate in the conference presided over by the President.
					
					 He asked them about supply of food, conditions of their dwelling houses, education of their children and other domestic affairs.
					
					 A woman told him about many families' insufficiency of provisions and another about inconvenience of each two families sharing a kitchen.
					
					 At that time each building of the factory's residential quarters was designed to house two families with a kitchen.
					
					 The President told an official of the factory that as it might be inconvenient for two families to share a kitchen, each family should have its own.
					
					 He then advised the women to organize a housewives' cooperative, make soybean sauce and paste by themselves and cultivate various vegetables such as red pepper in their family gardens to solve the shortage of non-staple foodstuffs.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a la trasplantacion de retonos de arroz
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a la trasplantacion de retonos de arroz
						
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ATCC) -- En acato al llamamiento combativo del partido a imprimir un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo en este ano del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea dando otro acicate a la industria ligera y la agricultura, todos deben terminar con exito la campana de trasplantacion de los retonos de arroz para propiciar abundantes cosechas en las granjas cooperativas socialistas en octubre.
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un editorial difundido hoy y continua:
					
					  En ese llamamiento esta reflejada la firme voluntad del PTC de hacer vivir feliz al pueblo coreano lo mas pronto posible y adelantar la victoria final de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Bajo la sabia guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se han sentado en Corea todas las bases para el incremento trascendental de la produccion agricola.
					
					  Especificamente, las tierras cultivables del pais han sido ordenadas con aires socialistas, se construyeron grandes canales como el Kaechon-lago Thaesong que atraviesan las llanuras cooperativas y se producen en cascadas los abonos hechos con recursos y tecnicas nacionales dando mucha alegria al pueblo.
					
					  Se registrara una gran revolucion en la produccion agricola si se explota toda la potencialidad productiva ya preparada, ateniendose firmemente a la orientacion del PTC de levantar una innovacion en la rama.
					
					  Dado que el trasplante de las posturas de arroz deviene una faena agricola que requiere la prisa y cuesta mucho trabajo, sera finalizado exitosamente cuando se movilice todo el pueblo.

articles.title: Se asientan nuevos animales en Parque Zoologico Nacional
articles.content:
Se asientan nuevos animales en Parque Zoologico Nacional
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ATCC) -- Recientemente, en el Parque Zoologico Nacional de Corea entraron 22 animales de 6 especies incluyendo una pareja de leon africano (Panthera leo), que obsequiara al Dirigente Kim Jong Il el Parque Zoologico de Kuwait con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung).
					  Entre ellos, atrae la atencion publica una pareja de dromedario (Camelus bromedarius) que tiene las patas mas largas de 30 cm que otros camellos del jardin zoologico.
					
					  Su altura de hombros es de 1.6-1.7 metros, su largo, de 2.5 metros mas o menos y su peso, de 400-500kg.
					
					  Ademas, una pareja de Ammotragus lervia que hace recordar una escultura probada cuando este animal no mueve y una pareja de astuto antilope de India (Antilope cervicapra) con pelo liso desde la cabeza hasta patas, tienen popularidad por su peculiaridad externa.
					
					  En este parque se ven Cercopithecus aethiopus (4 machos y 2 hembras) y Papio hamadryas (4 parejas).
					
					  Ahora, el jardin zoologico nacional cria y cuida en lo cientifico y tecnico esos animales.

articles.title: Insam (ginseng) de Kaesong
articles.content:
Insam (ginseng) de Kaesong
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ATCC) -- Desde la antiguedad, Insam (ginseng) de Kaesong es el producto especial de Corea conocido ampliamente en el mundo como "Insam de Coryo".
					La zona de Kaesong, ocupo el lugar importante en el cultivo y la elaboracion de Insam desde la Edad Media y era el centro del "comercio de Insam".
					
					Ahora tambien, se ven las tipicas parcelas de Insam en varios lugares de la ciudad para no hablar de las areas occidentales y surenas de Kaesong.
					
					Las plantas medicinales que se cultivan en las parcelas llamadas como Sampho, tienen gran eficiencia medica y el alto rendimiento por unidad de superficie.
					
					En la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Insam de Kaesong, la Fabrica de Medicina de Coryo y otras bases de elaboracion producen a base de las avanzadas ciencias y tecnicas los articulos elaborados de Insam de diversos generos, entre otros, Hongsam, Paeksam, Insamthang, tonico de Insam, Sonnyosam de Coryo, tableta de Insam, extracto de Insam, Kyongokgo, te de Insam, inyeccion de Insam, tonico para mujeres, etc.
					
					Ademas, diversos licores de Insam, que tienen  el  buen sabor y la gran eficiencia medica, ocupan la gran proporcion entre los articulos elaborados de  Insam.
					
					Tambien, los cosmeticos que tienen la popularidad entre las mujeres, toman por materias primas Insam de Kaesong.

articles.title: Editado en Siria libro dedicado al centenario de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Editado en Siria libro dedicado al centenario de Kim Il Sung
						
Pyongyang, 11 de mayo (ATCC) -- La Editorial de Dar Damasco de Siria dio a luz el libro conmemorativo por el centenario del nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung "La teoria de la politica de Songun de Kim Jong Il".
					En la cubierta y la portadilla del libro escrito por el presidente del Comite Arabe de Solidaridad con el Pueblo Coreano y de Apoyo a la Reunificacion de Corea en Jordania, Marwan Sudah, estan insertadas la foto del Dirigente Kim Jong Il respondiendo a las aclamaciones de las columnas del desfile militar y la otra del Dirigente inspeccionando una unidad del ejercito popular.
					
					El libro esta compuesto de "Capitulo I, el fondo de la epoca de la aparicion de la politica de Songun", "Capitulo II, la revolucion del Songun y la creacion del metodo de la politica de Songun", "Capitulo III, ?Que es el metodo de la politica de Songun?", "Capitulo IV, el ideal ideo-espiritual de la politica de Songun", "Capitulo V,  la inagotable vitalidad de la politica de Songun" y "Capitulo VI, la politica de Songun es la eterna estrategia revolucionaria por la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo y por la realizacion de la independencia".
					
					El libro senala que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il definio la politica de Songun como el metodo de la politica fundamental del socialismo mas cientifico y revolucionario de la epoca de la independencia. Escribe que esta es la politica del sublime amor por el pais, la nacion y el pueblo y  es la mas poderosa y digna politica independiente y explica en comparacion con la teoria precedente la justeza de nuevo criterio sobre el principio de dar mas importancia al ejercito que la clase obrera y sobre el grueso de la revolucion,  presentado por primera vez en la historia.
					
					Refiere con datos que en Corea se realizo en el nivel supremo la causa de la eternidad del Lider y se promueve energicamente la construccion de la gran potencia prospera frustrando todos los desafios de los imperialistas, con el poderio del Songun.
					
					Subraya que esta politica es la eterna bandera de la lucha antiimperialista que deberan enarbolar todos los paises y naciones que luchan contra el dominio y la subyugacion y por la independencia, y es el perfecto metodo de la politica que representa el  presente y el futuro de la humanidad y la linea estrategica a ser tomada constantemente.
